docs.text: Murtha Cancer Center Data Platform Documentation ¶ The Murtha Cancer Center Data Platform (MC2DP) is a Gen3 data mesh supporting the Prometheus Project. Goal ¶ Discover and study advanced precision technologies that will enable prevention, early detection, and enhanced treatments of cancers potentially arising due to exposures to environmental contaminants and toxin hazards by military service members and veterans. Vision ¶ Integrate federal scientific platforms with public-private innovators revealing the impact of service-related exposures to environmental contaminants and toxin hazards and developing prevention and early detection approaches and advanced treatments of cancers arising from these exposures. Capabilities ¶ Integrates multiple data commons and repositories, enabling seamless data connectivity and interoperability between various data sources. Represents a dynamic Data Ecosystem that aggregates and hosts metadata from multiple resources to make data discovery and access easy for users. MC2DP is powered by the open-source software “Gen3” . MC2DP was created by and is actively developed at the University of Chicago’s Center for Translational Data Science (CTDS) and the Open Commons Consotrium (OCC) with the aim of creating interoperable cloud-based data resources for the scientific research community.
docs.title: Quickstart - MC2DP Overview

docs.title: Capabilities

docs.text: Analysis Page ¶ The Analysis Page houses example analysis performed in MC2DP. These examples can be used to demonstrate the capabilities of MC2DP. Each example can be viewed as an HTML but is also available as a Jupyter Notebook in the Example Analysis directory of a users Workspace .
docs.title: Analysis Page

docs.text: Data Connections Page ¶ The Data Connections Page provides users with a concurrent summary of the data contained in MC2DP via data connections. The table summarizes data connection and is updated by the Data Curation team as connections are established or updated. The legend specifies the manner of the connection made from an external source to MC2DP. The categories include: - (green) - connection established with real data - (yellow) - connection established with synthetic data - (red) - connection not worrking/connection pending/data pending
docs.title: Data Connections

The categories include: - (green) - connection established with real data - (yellow) - connection established with synthetic data - (red) - connection not worrking/connection pending/data pending
docs.title: Data Connections Page

docs.text: Data Library Page ¶ Users must login before viewing the Data Library Page . The data library stores cohorts and data selections from that user in the Exploration Page .
docs.title: Data Library Page

docs.text: Exploration Page ¶ The primary tool for exploring data within MC2DP is the Exploration Page, which offers faceted search of data across data sources. This page can be accessed from the /explorer endpoint or the top navigation bar, by clicking on the “Exploration” icon. ![Exploration Page Intro][img-exploration_page_intro]{: .center-img style="height:100px"}
docs.title: Exploration Page
